stories.headline: CAR-covered planet
stories.summary: Ken Ward Jr. discusses the integration of computer-assisted reporting in environmental journalism, illustrating how technology can help report on toxic chemical emissions and hazardous waste dumps.

stories.headline: Waste deep
stories.summary: Mike Lee covers the tensions in Yakima Valley over Clean Water Act lawsuits against dairies, highlighting the industry's growth and its impact on the river's water quality.

stories.headline: Polluters online
stories.summary: Katie Schallert explores how the EPA's Toxic Release Inventory and related online tools help uncover environmental polluters and make company data accessible to the public.
